seo.title: Dumpus | Stats for Discord
seo.description: Get detailed insights and stats for your Discord account

shared.30DaysDelay: Keep in mind it can take up to 30 days to receive the email. Be patient!

slides.title: How does Dumpus work?
slides.description: Discord records every action you perform on their app in your "Data Package". Dumpus analyzes this package to generate statistics and information about your account.

slides.title: Can I trust Dumpus?
slides.description: This "Data Package" is very sensitive. That is why we need to be clear about what the Dumpus app does with it. Its source code is 100% open source (public). Although we offer a free processing server, you can use your own to keep full control over your data.

slides.title: Share it with your friends!
slides.description: While statistics are funny to see, they are even more fun to compare with your friends. That is why we have made it easy to share your stats with your friends.

setup.title: How do I get my data package?
setup.description: Select an operating system to get started.

link.title: Enter your Discord link
link.description: You can get it in the email received from Discord. Copy the link from the button entitled **You can download it here**.
link.backendURLHint: Your own hosted open source server URL
link.notice: By proceeding, you agree to our [privacy policy](/privacy) and our [terms](/terms).

email.title: Transfer the email (soon)
content: Transfer the email received from Discord to **process@dumpus.app**. We'll send you a link when it's ready.
